column4: hi everyone low sound in speaker and no sound in headphone help please
open your mixer settings
right click the speaker icon near the clock open vol control
ok
hit preferences - check PCM
then crank it up
I wouldnt go up to 100% on the PCM mixer, it might distort the sound -- prob 80%
yes i did it but no effect
try the different mixers
i tried but no change
i changed the mixers but still no effect on headphone]
even plugged into the same output as the speakers?
Anyone know how to save an mplayer stream?
Like a movie is playing in mplayer -- how do you save it...
speakers has a low volume but headphone has none
maybe its an audio driver issue -- go to system --> prefs --> sound and switch to ALSA
i did that too but no change
make sure you're changing the vol for the right device
in the volume control thing - change the device line to select the correct one
i checked it and changed but still no effect
dunno man ... sorry
ok
